metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2830 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Mozilla Firefox before 48.0 and Firefox ESR 45.x before 45.3 preserve thenetwork connection used for favicon resource retrieval after the associatedbrowser window is closed, which makes it easier for remote web servers totrack users by observing network traffic from multiple IP addresses.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2830` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '48.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
